mapper.select: select c.*,e.* from calculate_ c left join employee_ e on e.sal_id = c.cal_id union select c.*,e.* from calculate_ c right join employee_ e on e.sal_id = c.cal_id

select c.*,e.* from calculate_ c left join employee_ e on e.sal_id = c.cal_id
and cal_id like concat("%",#{cal_id},"%")
and cal_name like "%"#{cal_name}"%"
and cal_date like "%"#{cal_date}"%"
